task_description: Facing the building to your North-West (approx. 308°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to look up to see the full height of the building since my current pitch is 0°.
I need to adjust my heading to face the building directly at 308°NW to better assess its height.
I need to look up again to see the top of the building and estimate its height accurately.
I need to adjust my heading back to 308°NW while keeping the pitch up to see the building properly.
I can now see the top of the building and estimate its height based on the visual perspective and known reference points.
